main event: A bright object, described as a large ball of fire, was seen streaking across the street from the witness's house and disappearing between the houses on the other side of the street.
interesting points: The sighting happened suddenly, and the witness's husband and daughter could not tell from which part of the house the object came.
The witness found two patches of scorched grass, one in the backyard between the house and garage, and another in the front yard, which were later beginning to turn green again.
The sighting occurred on a clear, starry night.
The incident was not reported to the police because of the suddenness of the event.
A neighbor who was watching TV saw a flash of light but thought it was someone nearby taking flash pictures.
sighted object: a bright, large ball of fire
photographs: no, the report does not include any photographs
